content.question: Which of the following describes a visual limitation of the bar graph?

choices.label: Even though the bar graph contains data from 1998 to 2014, there is no illustration of how spending is broken down by specific years or elections.
The bar graph lists only corporations among the organizations that gave the most money for federal lobbying.
The bar graph depicts only special-interest fund-raising during the midterm election season as an indication of the influence of money in politics.
The bar graph does not provide as good of a comparison as a pie chart would provide.

content.answer: Even though the bar graph contains data from 1998 to 2014, there is no illustration of how spending is broken down by specific years or elections.
